backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that defines Plant types and exposes `assessPlant` and `uploadPhoto` endpoints; plant needs and emotions are determined deterministically from the photo blob's byte size.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that `PlantResults.tsx` was updated to prominently display the plant's emotional state with emoji, bold label, and age-appropriate message above the need-detection cards.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the Plant Feelings app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Plant Feelings' that mounts the React app via `src/main.tsx`.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that wraps `PlantScanner` inside the `Layout` component for consistent page theming.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Full-page layout wrapper with a botanical background, animated decorative elements, a `CuteTree` header component with sparkle/heart accents, and a footer with a QR code.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Animated loading screen featuring spinning leaf emojis, a bouncing glowing tree, sparkle accents, pulsing dots, and a fun plant fact message.
frontend/src/components/PlantResults.tsx: Results component that displays a prominent emotion card (large emoji, bold child-friendly label, age-appropriate message) at the top, followed by five NeedCard components for sunlight, water, soil, air quality, and pest detection.
frontend/src/components/QRCodeCanvas.tsx: A self-contained React component that implements a minimal QR code generator (adapted from nayuki/qrcodegen) and renders the resulting QR code onto an HTML canvas element.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient, exposing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a useAssessPlant mutation hook that sends an image as bytes to the backend actor's assessPlant method and returns the resulting Plant data.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines a nature-themed OKLCH CSS variable palette for light and dark modes, and declares custom keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/PlantScanner.tsx: A page component that lets users upload or capture a plant photo, sends it to the backend for assessment via useAssessPlant, and displays loading, error, or results states accordingly.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that extends the theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, nature palette, custom border radii, box shadows, and registers typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state (version 23) for a child-friendly plant health app that uses AI to analyze plant photos and display emoji-based mood/health results with motivational messages. Contains architectural notes, existing features, and known issues.
